inputs.name: to
inputs.description: Recipients of the email. Multiple recipients are allowed. E.g.: 'john.doe@alfresco.com, jane.doe@alfresco.com'

inputs.name: from
inputs.description: Sender email address. If not provided, the default configured from address is used. E.g.: 'hr@alfresco.com'

inputs.name: cc
inputs.description: The cc of the email. Multiple recipients are allowed. E.g.: 'john.doe@alfresco.com, jane.doe@alfresco.com'

inputs.name: bcc
inputs.description: The bcc of the email. Multiple recipients are allowed. E.g.: 'john.doe@alfresco.com, jane.doe@alfresco.com'

inputs.name: charset
inputs.description: Allows to change the charset of the email. E.g: 'UTF-8'

inputs.name: text
inputs.description: The content of the e-mail, in case one needs to send plain none-rich e-mails. Can be used in combination with html, for e-mail clients that donâ€™t support rich content. The client will then fall back to this text-only alternative.

inputs.name: html
inputs.description:
A piece of HTML that is the content of the e-mail. E.g: '

This is an email body

'

inputs.name: attachments
inputs.description: List of files to be attached. File variables are initialised by content actions or content events in triggers. E.g: 'Initialise a file variable by mapping it to the output of the generate document task.'

inputs.name: template
inputs.description: File that contains the template used for generating the document. Template files can be uploaded from the modeling app, or referenced from ACS.

inputs.name: metadata
inputs.description: Metadata to be used by the template to resolve variable placeholders. Metadata is a JSON object that contains key-value pairs

errors.name: MISSING_INPUT
errors.description: A mandatory input variable was not provided

errors.name: INVALID_INPUT
errors.description: The input variable has an invalid type

errors.name: EMAIL_CONNECTION_ERROR
errors.description: Unable to connect to email service

errors.name: EMAIL_AUTHENTICATION_ERROR
errors.description: Unable to authenticate into email service

errors.name: BAD_REQUEST
errors.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax

errors.name: UNAUTHORIZED
errors.description: The request has not been applied because it lacks valid authentication

errors.name: FORBIDDEN
errors.description: The server understood the request but refuses to authorize it

errors.name: NOT_FOUND
errors.description: The server could not find what was requested

errors.name: INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR
errors.description: The server has encountered a situation it doesn't know how to handle

errors.name: BAD_GATEWAY
errors.description: The server got an invalid response

errors.name: SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE
errors.description: The server is not ready to handle the request

errors.name: GATEWAY_TIMEOUT
errors.description: The server is acting as a gateway and cannot get a response in time

config.name: POLLING_PROTOCOL
config.description: Email protocol used for inbound emails

config.name: POLLING_USERNAME
config.description: User name of the account used for inbound emails

config.name: POLLING_PASSWORD
config.description: Password of the account used for inbound emails

config.name: POLLING_FOLDER
config.description: Folder from which inbound emails are retrieved

config.name: POLLING_PAGINATION
config.description: Number of emails that are retrieved within a single request

config.name: CRON_SCHEDULE
config.description: Cron expression used to configure inbound polling frequency
